Texto: 
non contributory
focal joint space narrowing of 2nd and 3rd right mcps. chondrocalcinosis of the tfcc.

unrelated post-traumatic changes of the 5th metacarpal.
cppd arthropathy of the hand
cppd arthropathy
osteoarthritis
82 year old male with progressive hand pain, especially at metacarpophalangeal joints.
